  • public class DeprecatedMLPredictor
extends MLPredictor
    /** MLPredictor which uses models from Summer 2012 to assign predictions on colonoscopy dataset. WARNING: some of these prediction models may have been trained on some of the same data that's being visualized in the current demo dataset!

    • Method Detail

      • loadPredictions

        public void loadPredictions()
        Description copied from class: MLPredictor
        Loads and/or generates appropriate attribute predictions for the model data. Namely, this method is responsible for appropriately populating predictionMapList.
        Specified by:
        loadPredictions in class MLPredictor

      • canWriteDocTextWithHighlights

        public boolean canWriteDocTextWithHighlights(int globalDocId,
                                    int globalAttrId)
        Description copied from class: MLPredictor
        Given a document ID and attribute ID, determines whether the predictor currently supports building of a highlighted version of the document.
        Specified by:
        canWriteDocTextWithHighlights in class MLPredictor
        Parameters:
        globalDocId - global int identifier for Document; serves as index into documentList
        globalAttrId - global int identifier for attribute; serves as index into attributeList
        Returns:
        true if predictor possesses necessary functionality to build highlighted version of document text, false otherwise

      • writeDocTextWithHighlights

        public void writeDocTextWithHighlights(javax.swing.text.AbstractDocument abstDoc,
                              int globalDocId,
                              int globalAttrId)
        Description copied from class: MLPredictor
        Given a document ID and attribute ID, builds a highlighted version of that document's text. This highlighted text is written into abstDoc.
        Specified by:
        writeDocTextWithHighlights in class MLPredictor
        Parameters:
        abstDoc - AbstractDocument whose content is to be replaced with that of the highlighted document text
        globalDocId - global int identifier for Document; serves as index into documentList
        globalAttrId - global int identifier for attribute; serves as index into attributeList
        See Also:
        emr_vis_nlp.ml.deprecated.DeprecatedMLPredictor.writeDocTextWithHighlights(AbstractDocument abstDoc, int globalDocId, int globalAttrId)
